old:
おつかれさまです、隊長
俺のやる気、爆発しそうですよ！
column2: Captain--I'll be counting on you for a few more minutes.
speaker: Elliot

old:
隊長、俺を忙しくしてください
ジョゼフ様のところへは戻りたくないんです
column2: Captain, please keep me busy I don't want to go back to Master Joseph.
speaker: Elliot

old:
レスタニアはまた大変なことになりましたけど――
そのおかげで隊長と一緒に働けて――
column2:
Lestania is in trouble again, but--
that allowed me to work with the captain and--
speaker: Elliot

old: 不謹慎だけど――俺、うれしいです
column2: I know it's inappropriate—but I'm glad I'm here.
speaker: Elliot

old:
隊長がレオ統率の右腕なら――
俺は隊長の右腕になります！
column2: If Captain is Leo's right-hand man, I will be Captain's right-hand man!
speaker: Elliot

old:
リズと俺――ある意味、敵同士ですよね
どっちが隊長の信頼を勝ち取るか――みたいな
column2:
Lise and me――In a way, we are enemies, aren't we?
It's like, who will earn the captain's trust?
speaker: Elliot

old:
セシリーはちょっと固いというか――
真面目すぎるんですよね
column2:
Cecily is a bit stiff or--
too serious.
speaker: Elliot

old:
オーク戦争の頃、リズはレスタニアを巡って
お宝とか探してたらしいですね
なんだか、遅れを取った気分です
column2:
I heard that during the orc wars, Lise was cruising around Lestania looking for treasures and stuff.
I feel like I'm falling behind!
speaker: Elliot

old:
侵食魔のせいかな――
少し空気が濁った感じ、しませんか？
column2:
Maybe it's the Corruption?
The air seems a little muddy, don't you think?
speaker: Elliot

old:
隊長――
やっぱり覚者というのは戦ってこそ、ですよね
つくづく、そう思いますよ
column2:
Captain--
Indeed, it is through battle that an Arisen truly shows their worth.
I am deeply convinced of this.
speaker: Elliot

old:
ガルドリンが細々と賭けを持ちかけてくるんですよね
おかげで――いえ、なんでもありません！
column2: Gurdolin keeps coming up with small bets, you know. Thanks to that... Well, never mind!
speaker: Elliot

old:
戦いに慣れてから、時々ですけど、もっと刺激が
ほしいなんて、考えちゃうんですよ
column2: After getting used to battles, sometimes, I can't help but think that I want more excitement.
speaker: Elliot

old: ダメですよね、こういうこと考えちゃ
column2: It's not good, thinking about things like that.
speaker: Elliot

old:
ガルドリンのこと、いろんな人から聞くんですけど
どうやら最近は丸くなったというか
落ち着いたというか――
column2: I hear about Gurdolin from various people, and it seems that recently, they have become more well-rounded, or rather, calmer.
speaker: Elliot

old:
最近のことしか知らない俺にしてみれば
これで！？　って感じですけどね
column2: From my perspective, as someone who only knows recent things, I have to say... is this it!? But well, that's how I feel.
speaker: Elliot

old:
ジョゼフ様から聞く話に隊長が登場するようになって
どれくらい経つか忘れましたけど――
column2: It has been some time since Captain made their debut, or so it feels, as I heard from Sir Joseph. But I can't exactly remember how long ago it was.
speaker: Elliot

old: 思うに、隊長って、全然変わってないですよね
column2: In my opinion, the captain hasn't changed at all, right?
speaker: Elliot

old:
リズって、ああ見えて、意外と世の中を
見てるんですよね
自分のことは見えていないようだけど
column2:
Lise looks like that, but she sees the world
surprisingly well.
She doesn't seem to see herself, though.
speaker: Elliot

old: なんでしょうか、隊長！
column2: What is it, Captain!
speaker: Elliot

old:
セシリーはいい子ですよねえ
力になってあげたいなあ
column2: Cecily is a good girl, isn't she? I want to be supportive.
speaker: Elliot

old:
隊長、急ぎましょう
何もかも、急ぎましょう
column2:
Captain, let's hurry!
with everything, I mean
speaker: Elliot

old:
早くセシリーを楽にしてあげないと
こっちまで息が詰まりそうです
column2:
We need to make Cecily feel better soon.
I'm choking up too!
speaker: Elliot

old:
まあ、楽にすると言っても
どうしたらいいかなんて
わからないんですけどね
column2:
Well, even if I say I want to make it easier,
I don't know what to do, you know?
speaker: Elliot

old:
騎士団には売れるだけ恩を売っておけなんていう
覚者もいますけど、俺に言わせれば
持ちつ持たれつですよ
column2: Some Arisen believe in gaining favor with the knight order as much as possible, but in my opinion, it's all about mutual support.
speaker: Elliot

old:
売ったとか買ったとか、借りた貸したなんて
どうでもいいことです――
って、考えられる人になりたいんです、俺
column2: Selling, buying, borrowing, lending... It's all trivial stuff. I want to become someone who can think about more important things—me.
speaker: Elliot

old:
時々、セシリーが思い詰めた顔をしていますよ？
なんとかしてあげられませんかねえ
もう、見ていられませんよ
column2:
Sometimes, Cecily has a troubled look on her face, you know?
Can't we do something to help her?
I can't bear to watch anymore.
speaker: Elliot

old:
隊長、レスタニアは広いですね
今回ばかりは痛感しています
column2:
Captain, Lestania is far, isn't it?
I am feeling this particularly keenly this time.
speaker: Elliot

old:
走っても、戦っても、尽きない敵
ええ、やりがいがありますよ！
column2:
Running, fighting, and endless enemies.
Yes, it's challenging!
speaker: Elliot

old: 俺、連戦でちょっと疲れちゃって――
column2: I'm a little tired from the consecutive battles...
speaker: Elliot

old:
もちろん、何かあれば動きますから
それ以外はここでジッとさせてください
column2:
Of course, if you need me to move, I'll move.
Otherwise, please let me stay put here.
speaker: Elliot

old:
俺は隊長の右腕を自認してますから
誰が戻ろうと、去ろうと、そこだけは
変わりませんからね
speaker: Elliot

old: もちろん、ものすごく期待はしていますけど――
column2: Of course, I have really high expectations, but -
speaker: Elliot

old:
セシリーの記憶が戻っても問題が
解決するわけじゃないんですよね
鍛錬して、腕を磨いておこうかな
column2: Even if Cecily's memory returns, it doesn't mean the problem will be solved, right? Maybe I should train and sharpen my skills.
speaker: Elliot

old: 黒騎士対策が急務ってところですかね
column2: Is countermeasures against the Black Knight the urgent matter here?
speaker: Elliot

old:
記憶が戻るとか、どうでも良くなりましたね
せめて意識が戻ってくれれば――
column2: Back to memory, or whatever, it doesn't matter anymore. At least if consciousness can return—
speaker: Elliot

old:
隊長、急ぎましょうよ
急いては事をし損じるなんて
言ってる場合じゃありません！
column2:
Captain, let's hurry up.
There's no time to waste by rushing.
We can't afford to be talking about it!
speaker: Elliot

old:
白竜様以外の竜の覚者と一緒に戦うなんて
こんな機会はもうないかもしれませんよね？
column2: Isn't it unlikely to ever have the opportunity to fight alongside any dragon's Arisen other than the White Dragon?
speaker: Elliot

old:
隊長と一緒にいられるだけでも幸せなのに
その師匠筋のレオ統率の生き様まで
間近で見られて――俺、胸が熱いです
column2:
I am happy just being able to be with the captain,
And now, witnessing the way of life of Leo
up close... My heart is burning.
speaker: Elliot

old:
耳を澄ますと、聞き慣れない音がしますね
空気が濃くて、ねっとりとまとわりつくような――
column2: When you listen carefully, you can hear unfamiliar sounds. The air is thick and sticky, as if it is enveloping you.
speaker: Elliot

old:
気にしすぎですかね――
やっぱり、ビビってるんですかね
column2: Is it because I'm worrying too much - Am I just being scared after all?
speaker: Elliot

old: ガルドリンは俺が見つけてみせますよ
column2: Gurdolin will be found
speaker: Elliot

old:
あの人は認めないでしょうけど
俺たち、結構、心が通じ合っているような
気がするんですよね
column2:
That person might not admit it, but
I feel like our hearts are somewhat connected
you know
speaker: Elliot

old:
ロイグはどこでしょうね
ガルドリンも、はぐれたきりらしいですよ
column2: Where can Loeg be? Gurdolin also seems to be lost.
speaker: Elliot

old:
セシリーのお父さんは
それなりに強い戦士に育った娘の帰りを
待っていたのではないでしょうか？
column2: I think Cecily's father was waiting for his daughter to return after she grew up to be a strong warrior in her own right.
speaker: Elliot

old:
本当は娘と一緒に行きたかったけど
いつまでも待っているわけにはいかず――
column2: I really wanted to go with my daughter, but I couldn't wait forever to--
speaker: Elliot

old:
とすれば、セシリーを早く帰してやれなかった
俺たちの責任も、あるのかもしれません
column2: If that's the case, maybe it's our fault for not getting Cecily home sooner.
speaker: Elliot

old:
族長が回復したらすぐに出発できるように
身体を温めておきましょう
電光石火の、雫奪回作戦です！
column2: Once the clan chief has recovered, we can depart immediately, so let's keep our bodies warm. It's time for the lightning-fast operation to reclaim the drop!
speaker: Elliot

old:
あははは
なんだかセシリーが大きく見えますよね
ここで居心地悪そうにしてた時とは
別人のようです
column2:
Ahahahaha!
Somehow, Cecily looks bigger, doesn't she?
She seems like a completely different person from when she was feeling uncomfortable here.
speaker: Elliot

old:
フィンダムの中心部に向かうんですよね
しかも、世界を救うために――
これって、凄いことだなあ
column2:
We're heading to the heart of Phindym,
And to save the world--
This is awesome!
speaker: Elliot

old:
さあ、まだ魔物はいますよ！
休んでいるヒマなんてありません
column2:
Well, there are still enemies here!
There is no time to rest.
speaker: Elliot

old:
胸騒ぎが止まりません――
なんでしょう、これ
column2:
I can't stop the excitement--
What is this?
speaker: Elliot

old:
わははは！
隊長、もう感情を抑えられません
早く決めちゃいましょう！
column2:
Wahaha!
Captain, I can't contain my emotions anymore.
Let's decide quickly!
speaker: Elliot

old:
理というのは――
見方によっちゃあ、酷なものですね
column2: Depending on how you look at it, order can be a cruel thing, you know.
speaker: Elliot

old:
俺たちをここに連れてきた竜の思惑なんて
わかりませんけど、アッカーシェランには
俺たちの援助が必要です
column2: I don't understand the intentions of the dragon that brought us here, but Acre Selund needs our assistance.
speaker: Elliot

old: 俺は、そう確信しています！
column2: I am convinced of that!
speaker: Elliot

old: この状況、俺たちで変えて見せましょう！
column2: Let's change this situation, and show what we can do!
speaker: Elliot

old: 王子はどこですかねえ
column2: Where is the prince, I wonder?
speaker: Elliot

old:
聞くところによると西方はなかなか
厄介な地域らしいですよ
column2: According to reports, the western region is said to be quite troublesome area.
speaker: Elliot

old: 王家の威光もあまり届いていないとか
column2: The royal family's authority does not seem to reach very far.
speaker: Elliot

old:
隊長、アッカーシェランの歴史や政治とは
距離を置いた方が得策ですよね
column2: Captain, it's in your best interest to keep your distance from Acre Selund's history and politics
speaker: Elliot

old:
王子救出に夢中になっていましけど
悪しき竜"はどこにいるんでしょうね"
column2:
I'm currently focused on rescuing the prince,
but where could the "Evil Dragon" be?
speaker: Elliot

old: 邪魔する気もないみたいですし
column2: And they don't seem to want to interfere.
speaker: Elliot

old:
王子はまだまだ子供で頼りないけど
そのおかげで解放軍は一丸となる――
column2: The prince is still a child and unreliable, but thanks to that, the liberation army will unite as one.
speaker: Elliot

old:
俺でさえ、守ってやりたいと
思いますからね
column2: Even I, want to protect you.
speaker: Elliot

old:
ネド王子、王子らしくあろうとして
無理してる気がするんですけど
隊長、どう思います？
column2:
Prince Nedo, I feel like he's trying to be more like a prince and forcing himself.
Captain, what do you think?
speaker: Elliot

old:
武器、防具――装備品、全ての手入れは
完璧です！
column2: Weapons, armor--equipment, all taken care of perfectly!
speaker: Elliot

old: 悪しき竜の言葉を覚えていますか？
column2: Do you remember the words of the "Evil Dragon"?
speaker: Elliot

old:
絶望の大陸を楽しめって――
俺たち、挑発されてますよ？
乗ってやりましょうか！？
column2: "Enjoy the Land of Despair" - we are being provoked. Shall we ride?!
speaker: Elliot

old:
休める時には休む
これ、俺たちよく忘れちゃいますよね
column2:
Rest when you can.
We often forget this!
speaker: Elliot

old:
休める時には休む
これ、俺たちよく忘れちゃいますよね
column2:
Rest when you can.
We often forget this!
speaker: Elliot

old: やっぱり覚者は戦ってこそ、ですね
column2: After all, an Arisen should fight.
speaker: Elliot

old:
これも広い意味で白竜様をお守りする
覚者ならではの戦いですから
column2: This is also a battle in the broad sense of protecting the White Dragon, that only the Arisen can fight.
speaker: Elliot

old:
ジョゼフ様じゃありませんが――
事がうまく運ぶほど悪しき竜"の
動向が気になっちゃいますね"
column2:
I'm not Joseph, but--
the more things go well, the more I wonder what the "evil dragon" is up to.
speaker: Elliot

old:
解放軍が増員されれば俺たちの負担も
多少は減るでしょうから、黒い騎士のことは
その時に考えましょう
column2:
If the liberation army is increased, our burden will be
 reduced, so let's think about the black knight at that time!
speaker: Elliot

old:
鎧の中身が誰だろうと目の前に現れたら
俺は戦うだけですよ！
column2: Whoever is in the armor, if they show up in front of me I'm just going to fight!
speaker: Elliot

old:
隊長、どうしましょう
何から手をつけていいのか――
column2:
Captain, what should we do
I don't even know where to start--
speaker: Elliot

old:
早くなんとかしないと俺たちまで
動けなくなりますね
column2: If we don't do something soon, even we will become unable to move.
speaker: Elliot

old:
やりましょう、隊長
俺、レスタニアもアッカーシェランも
全部引き受けますよ！
column2:
Let's do it, Captain.
I'll take care of Lestania, Acre Selund,
I'll take care of everything!
speaker: Elliot

old:
黒騎士を倒して白竜様の力と
メガドを取り戻しましょう！
column2: Let's defeat the Black Knight and restore the power of the White Dragon and Megado!
speaker: Elliot

old:
いやー、なんか、鼻歌出ちゃいますよ
ついつい浮かれちゃうんです
column2:
Well, somehow, a song just slips out.
I can't help but get carried away.
speaker: Elliot

old: ネド王子が我々と離れたがっている――
column2: Prince Nedo wants to leave us—
speaker: Elliot

old:
これまでの経緯を思うと
それは考えにくいですよね
column2:
Given what we've been through,
that's unlikely.
speaker: Elliot

old:
この時間に何かできることが
あるかもしれませんね？
column2: At this time, there may be something we can do, right?
speaker: Elliot

old:
体力増強とか地勢確認とか――
考えてみましょうか
column2: Maybe we should think about increasing our strength, or checking the terrain--
speaker: Elliot

old:
俺はいつ、どんな時でも隊長の右腕です
頼りにしてくださいね
column2:
I'm the captain's right hand man whenever and however you need me.
You can count on me.
speaker: Elliot

old:
大丈夫ですってば！
みんな心配しすぎですよ
column2:
I'm fine!
Everyone is worrying too much.
speaker: Elliot

old:
あははは――
少し張り切り過ぎました
column2:
Ahahaha――
I got a little too carried away.
speaker: Elliot

old:
落ち着いたらキノザのお湯に浸かって
養生するつもりです
column2: Once I get settled down, I plan to soak in the Kinoza hot spring for recuperation.
speaker: Elliot
